Indications and doses

Prophylaxis of mild to moderate asthma (in patients stabilised on twice daily dose),

By inhalation of powder

  • For adults
    200–400 micrograms once daily (max. per dose 800 micrograms), dose to be given in the evening.
  • For children 6–11 years
    200–400 micrograms once daily, dose to be given in the evening.
  • For children 12–17 years
    200–400 micrograms once daily (max. per dose 800 micrograms), dose to be given in the evening.

Prophylaxis of asthma,

By inhalation of nebulised suspension

  • For adults
    100–800 micrograms twice daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary.
  • For adults
    Initially 0.25–1 mg twice daily, adjusted according to response, doses higher than recommended max. may be used in severe disease; maximum 2 mg per day.
  • For children 6–11 years
    100–400 micrograms twice daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary.
  • For children 12–17 years
    100–800 micrograms twice daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary.
  • For children 6 months–11 years
    125–500 micrograms twice daily, adjusted according to response; maximum 2 mg per day.
  • For children 12–17 years
    Initially 0.25–1 mg twice daily, adjusted according to response, doses higher than recommended max. may be used in severe disease; maximum 2 mg per day.

Prophylaxis and treatment of allergic and vasomotor rhinitis,

By intranasal administration

  • For adults
    Initially 200 micrograms daily, dose to be administered into each nostril in the morning, alternatively initially 100 micrograms twice daily, dose to be administered to each nostril; reduced to 100 micrograms daily, dose to be administered into each nostril, dose can be reduced when control achieved.
  • For children 12–17 years
    Initially 200 micrograms daily, dose to be administered into each nostril in the morning, alternatively initially 100 micrograms twice daily, dose to be administered to each nostril; reduced to 100 micrograms daily, dose to be administered into each nostril, dose can be reduced when control achieved.

Nasal polyps,

By intranasal administration

  • For adults
    100 micrograms twice daily for up to 3 months, dose to be administered into each nostril.
  • For children 12–17 years
    100 micrograms twice daily for up to 3 months, dose to be administered into each nostril.

Potency of preperations

Dose adjustments may be required for some inhaler devices, see under individual preparations.

Advice regarding hepatic impairment

Directions for administration

When used by inhalation

Budesonide nebuliser suspension is not suitable for use in ultrasonic nebulisers.

With oral use in children

Capsules can be opened and the contents mixed with apple or orange juice.

With oral use in adults

Granules should be placed on tongue and washed down with water without chewing.

Advice for patients and carers

When used by inhalation

With high doses, a steroid card should be supplied.

Patients or carers should be given advice on how to administer budesonide dry powder inhaler and nebuliser suspension.

With oral use in adults

Patients or carers should be given advice on how to administer budesonide granules.

In children

Medicines for Children leaflet: Budesonide inhaler for asthma prevention (prophylaxis)

www.medicinesforchildren.org.uk/budesonide-inhaler-asthma-prevention-prophylaxis

Cautions regarding administration

  • With systemic use: autoimmune hepatitis in adults

Unlicensed use

With oral use or rectal use in children

Not licensed for use in children.

When used by inhalation in children

Pulmicort nebuliser solution not licensed for use in children under 3 months; not licensed for use in bronchopulmonary dysplasia.

Information regarding prescribing and dispensing

Flavours of granule formulations may include lemon.

Exceptions to legal category

With intranasal use in adults

Preparations of budesonide can be sold to the public for nasal administration as a nasal spray if supplied for the prevention and treatment of seasonal allergic rhinitis in adults over 18 years subject to max. single dose of 200 micrograms per nostril, max. daily dose of 200 micrograms per nostril for max. period of 3 months, and a pack size of 10 mg.
